name: Orb of Life
description:
Ludum Dare #44 Compo Entry

Theme: Your Life is a Currency

Game title: Orb of Life

Genre: Tower Defense + Clicker

Summon Orbs from your Life energy to prevent negative Life energy from depleting your own Life energy! Summoned Orbs expire after certain amount! Currently, the game has three different types of Orbs:

1) Destruction Orb: Destruction Orb will deal moderate damage and live a moderate lifespan.

2) Time Orb: Time Orb slows enemies it damages. It also has a larger range!

3) Regeneration Orb: Regeneration Orb regenerates some amount of life over its lifespan!

Complete 5 waves to get a chance to ascend! Ascension allows you to enhance your Orbs, but also enhances the negative life force in upcoming waves! Each ascension costs you your own Life, so plan accordingly!
